static const int LOCAL_CAHCE_FACTORY = 2
 Defining that LocalCacheEntityFactory will be created. Not implemented yet.

Detailed Description

"Abstract Factory" design pattern implementatin for using with server services and local cache. Or 2 versions of API at simultaneously. To get factory's instance you should use getDAOFactory method. Type of factory's realization is specified by integer constant:

  • AbstractEntityFactory::REMOTE_SERVER_FACTORY creates RemoteServerEntityFactory. Target factory provides DAO which fetch data from remote server.
  • AbstractEntityFactory::LOCAL_CAHCE_FACTORY creates LocalCacheEntityFactory. Not implemented yet.
See also:
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerEntityFactory

AbstractEntityFactory is base class for all factories. Any factory must derive this interface. To obtain data model, use DAO classes. One for each kind of data model.

See also:
dropsend::data::dao::IAccountDAO

AbstractEntityFactory * AbstractEntityFactory::getDAOFactory ( int  factoryType  )  [static]

Gets necessary factory. Type of factory's realization is specified by factoryType:

  • AbstractEntityFactory::REMOTE_SERVER_FACTORY creates RemoteServerEntityFactory. Target factory provides DAO which fetch data from remote server.
  • asdasd AbstractEntityFactory::LOCAL_CAHCE_FACTORY creates LocalCacheEntityFactory. Not implemented yet.
    See also:
    dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerEntityFactory
    Parameters:
    factoryType Factory's type.
    Returns:
    Instance of target factory. Or NULL, if there is no factory for set constant.
